channel.title: security on Karthick-K
channel.description: Recent content in security on Karthick-K

item.title: Encrypt Decrypt With Gpg
item.description: This article explains encryption and decryption of files using GNU gpg Setup GNU gpg Generate Keys gpg --full-generate-key passphrase is optional Encrypting a file gpg -e -r "karthickk" .wekan.json This creates a file with an extension .gpg Decrypting a file gpg -o .wekan.json -d .wekan.json.gpg
